news_header: Taylor Morrison Home is expected to report a 17.1% increase in quarterly earnings, with revenues projected at $2.13 billion.
news_original_title: What Analyst Projections for Key Metrics Reveal About Taylor Morrison (TMHC) Q4 Earnings
news_text: Wall Street analysts predict that Taylor Morrison Home (TMHC) will report quarterly earnings of $2.40 per share, reflecting a year-over-year increase of 17.1%. Revenues are expected to reach $2.13 billion, a 5.6% increase from the previous year. Analysts have maintained their EPS estimates over the past month, indicating a collective reassessment of projections. Key metrics include estimated revenues from home closings at $2.07 billion (+7%), financial services revenue at $47.09 million (+9%), and land closings revenue at $15.00 million (-49.2%). Other metrics include net sales orders of 2,565 and homes closed at 3,402. TMHC shares have risen 4.3% over the past month.
